reason: Immediate strong upward momentum from significant short liquidations signals a markup phase. However, persistent regulatory uncertainty stemming from Coinbase's stance and political clashes over crypto legislation introduces substantial volatility and potential headwinds, necessitating close monitoring despite long-term positive signals from institutional tokenization efforts.
headlines: Bitcoin and ether's sharp breakouts liquidate nearly $700 million short positions
Coinbase pulls support from crypto market structure bill
More than half of all crypto tokens have failed — and most died in 2025
Figure joins stock tokenization race with new trading platform backed by BitGo, Jump
Senate banking chairman Scott: Trump-tied ethics clash doesn't belong in his crypto bill
